WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnose your PC in Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) to help you solve the problem.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: 在 Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) 下偵測您的電腦，以幫助您解決問題。

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: 在 Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) 下检测您的电脑，以帮助您解决问题。

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: شخِّص حالة حاسوبك الشخصي في بيئة إصلاح Windows (WinRE) لمساعدتك في حل المشكلة.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: K vyřešení problému proveďte diagnostiku počítače v prostředí Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE).

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Stel een diagnose van uw pc in de Windows Herstelomgeving (WinRE) om u te helpen bij het oplossen van het probleem.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Effectuez un diagnostic de votre PC dans l'Environnement de récupération Windows (WinRE) pour vous aider à résoudre le problème.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Führen Sie Ihre PC-Diagnose in der Windows-Wiederherstellungsumgebung (WinRE) durch, um das Problem zu beheben.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: אבחן את המחשב שלך בסביבת Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) כדי לפתור את הבעיה.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnosztizálja a számítógépét a Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) segítségével, hogy segítsen a probléma megoldásában.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnosis PC Anda di Lingkungan Pemulihan Windows (WinRE) untuk membantu Anda mengatasi masalah.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Esegui una diagnosi del PC tramite Ambiente di ripristino Windows (WinRE) per provare a risolvere il problema.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Windows 回復環境（WinRE）で PC を診断して、問題が解決できるか確認します。

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Windows 복구 환경(WinRE)에서 PC를 진단하면 문제를 해결하는 데 도움이 됩니다.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Aby rozwiązać problem, zdiagnozuj komputer w środowisku odzyskiwania systemu Windows (WinRE).

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnostique o seu PC em Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) para lhe ajudar a resolver o problema.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Faça o diagnóstico do seu PC no Ambiente de Recuperação do Windows (WinRE) para ajudar a resolver o problema.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnosticați calculatorul în Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) pentru a vă ajuta în soluționarea problemelor.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Для решения проблемы выполните диагностику компьютера в среде восстановления Windows (WinRE).

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnostique su PC en el Entorno de recuperación de Windows (WinRE) para ayudarle a resolver el problema.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Diagnostisera din dator i Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) för att få hjälp att lösa problemet.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: วินิจฉัยเครื่อง PC ของคุณใน Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) เพื่อช่วยคุณแก้ปัญหา

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Sorunu çözmenize yardımcı olması için PC'nizi Windows Kurtarma Ortamında (WinRE) tanılayın.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Проведіть діагностику ПК в Оточенні Відновлення Windows (WinRE). Це допоможе усунути проблему.

WinRETool.Name: MyASUS in WinRE
WinRETool.Description: Hãy chẩn đoán máy tính ở Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) để giúp bạn khắc phục sự cố.
